document_data.name: Jujimo
document_data.title: The Padhrasattva of Caution
document_data.mainbody: '''Jujimo''' was the [[Padhrasattva]] of Caution within the [[Padhran religion]].
document_data.Signs: Signs of bad luck (such as the absence of the rainbow at [[Rainbow Falls]]) were often regarded by natives of [[Ra-Khati]] as signals from Jujimo to exercise caution.
